Name: Base Station License, Rainbow Radio Dispatch, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Rainbow Radio Dispatch Inc., submitted as Rainbow Radio Dispatch, Inc., for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Brooklyn.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Rainbow Radio Dispatch Inc., submitted as Rainbow Radio Dispatch, Inc., for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 387-9 Troy Avenue in the borough of Brooklyn is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#937
